d415956deb14.description: Home to some of the best stories on medium. Look around, relax and enjoy one with a sip of coffee.
d415956deb14.name: The Coffeelicious
d415956deb14.shortDescription: Home to some of the best stories on medium.

paragraphs.text: Omg. I lose two hours every morning in the bathroom. The shower being the worst culprit!
paragraphs.name: bdf0
d9eb
paragraphs.text: Then I look at the digital clock on the television to be sure to wake him up on time. Still, I frequently let him oversleep, because I am easily distracted and when I am drawing or writing, time is a complete mystery to me. What seems like 3 minutes is 15 and what feels like 15 minutes is 3 hours.

If I want to wake Peter up on time, I have to stop what I’m doing and just sit and watch the clock patiently, waiting for the LED display to match the prearranged time. At which point I go in his office and he’s already awake! Just watching me with a sweet smile.
paragraphs.name: d0c9

paragraphs.text: I began giggling with embarrassment. Peter swiftly guided me on our way.

If I want to wake Peter up on time, I have to stop what I’m doing and just sit and watch the clock patiently, waiting for the LED display to match the prearranged time. At which point I go in his office and he’s already awake! Just watching me with a sweet smile.
paragraphs.name: d0c9

paragraphs.text: I was laughing out loud!!! I love this. Also, you can use the timer on your iPhone. Then you won’t have to stare at the digital clock. Bermuda Triangle, here you come!
paragraphs.name: 8ac7

paragraphs.text: He absolutely does. When he read my story he was horrified and said he would gladly set his alarm, but I told him he does so much for me and asks so little, it is the least I can do for him.
Believe me, I am definitely the lucky one in this relationship! I would follow him to the ends of the earth and live in a teepee with him if necessary.
paragraphs.name: bc45

virtuals.subtitle: Believe me, I am definitely the lucky one in this relationship! I would follow him to the ends of the earth and live in a teepee with him…

content.subtitle: Believe me, I am definitely the lucky one in this relationship! I would follow him to the ends of the earth and live in a teepee with him…

paragraphs.text: Yes, most definitely!
Time Waits for No One.
paragraphs.name: 043a

paragraphs.text: And it especially won’t wait for me.
paragraphs.name: 1bed

1a6e13adb709.title: I struggle with time management, too.

paragraphs.text: I struggle with time management, too. I guess it’s a common theme with those of us who deal with anxiety.

37572807dbb1.title: Yes!!! It some kind of magic voodoo.

paragraphs.text: Yes!!! It some kind of magic voodoo.
paragraphs.name: fbc8

5d54360832b0.title: He asks so little of me and does so much, I feel like the least I can do is wake him up with a kiss…

paragraphs.text: He asks so little of me and does so much, I feel like the least I can do is wake him up with a kiss and a smile. I need the timer for myself!
paragraphs.name: e118

paragraphs.text: Thank God I’m not the only one with Bermuda Triangle Syndrom (BTS).
paragraphs.name: b1eb

paragraphs.text: I really appreciate finding such a great essay about Time; the issues with processing time, marking it’s passing, and trying to estimate how long things take. This is a Big Topic in our household and so far…
